extent.value: in 1 half manuscript box and 1 oversize flat box

abstract.value: Waldo E. Chapin (1917 - 2011) graduated from New York University with a Degree of Bachelor of Science in February 1948. The collection contains Chapin’s final examination portfolio for his Introduction to Art course, a graduation confirmation letter, and a 1948 commencement program.

p.value: Published citations should take the following form: Identification of item, date (if known); Waldo Chapin Collection; MC 277; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.
There is no documentation concerning the provenance of these materials.

Waldo Chapin (1917 - 2011) graduated from New York University with a Degree of Bachelor of Science in February 1948. Chapin was a Staff Sergeant in the U.S. Army Air Corps where he served from 1939-1945. He worked at the National Council on Compensation Insurance (NCCI) for forty years.

Waldo Chapin (1917-2011) graduated from New York University with a Degree of Bachelor of Science in February 1948.  This collection consists of Chapin’s final examination portfolio for his Introduction to Art course, a graduation confirmation letter, and a 1948 commencement program.
